modules.description: This module defines custom binding operators for working with `result` values. It provides `let|` for chaining functions that return `result` types and `let-` for mapping over successful results. These operators simplify error handling when parsing or transforming structured data like spreadsheets.

This module defines two infix operators for chaining result values. The `>>|` operator applies a function to the success case of a result, propagating errors, while `||>` maps the success case to another value without handling errors. These operators simplify sequential processing of result values in error-handling workflows.

This module converts Excel (.xlsx) files to CSV format, handling both in-memory strings and file paths as input and output targets. It supports configurable text encoding and optional exclusion of hidden sheets during conversion. The `convert` and `convert_content` functions perform the core transformation, returning result values that encapsulate success or error states.
